title: What do the tier rules say about the split between science and politics? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s says that, as of now, all the areas in tier 3 are labour strongholds who are unlikely to vote for Boris (there are a few Tory constituencies in that block but not many). No vast Tory areas are currently in tier 3. The science says it is unlikely to work but The PM has to do something and he is choosing to do so in places that will not harm his political future. It’s politics.
